feed.title: Your Blog Name
feed.subtitle: I am writing about my experiences as a naval navel-gazer.

entry.title: weekly analysis - 2019 bottom compared to current price
entry.content:
• Recent price action has followed that of early 2019.
  • If this trend continues, BTC will be valued at around 35,000 USD by end of year.
  • Price could still drop to 18,500 USD before reversing upwards.
  • Difference from 2019 is that in 2022 price has gone below the 200 week moving average.
  • DXY possibly peak at around 120.
  • If DXY does reach 120, then BTC price could drop further.
  • Monthly candle closed below 50 month moving average.
  • Gray trendline could be the support, but this is speculative.
  • Price could still drop to 18,500 USD hitting the gray trendline.
